segments.text: Good morning . Do I need an appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , ma'am , there's only one person ahead of you . You won't have to wait long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , madam , it's your turn . What will it be today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been wearing my hair long for years , but now I'd like to try some kind of modern style . What do you suggest for a woman like me , that is , with hair like mine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come here , please . We'd like to wash your hair first . That way it will be easier to cut and style . I think you'll like this style . It's very fashionable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so . I'm really tired of this old-fashioned style that I've been wearing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like me to blow-dry your hair ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , if you think it will help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's great ! Will it be hard to care for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . When you wash it , it will fall into place naturally . You'll probably need another cut in about a month . Shall I make an appointment for you ?
segments.speaker: S2
